name: Territorial 2
description:
Click on the colored squares to pick your colors, then press play.

You play as the circle in the middle and must protect yourself, your planet, and your people with the laser that follows your mouse.

Your line can destroy the meteors attacking your planet.

Watch out, your laser can only appear on your planet!

Changes from the original:

  • The game is in space!
  • People spawn on your planet!
  • You can pick your own colors!
  • Some meteors are huge but slow!
  • There is new music!
  • You can quit by pressing escape!
